data.name: Grand Hike
data.detailed_description:
OTHER UPCOMING GAMES!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2092410/Pink_Explorer/


About the Game

Go on a unique and unforgettable Hike and discover the old historical forest and it's secrets. Get ready for an calm and relaxing adventure far away from the civilization. What kinds of encounters will your Hike have?

Explore

  • Explore the giant forest and come across many different areas and small puzzle like problems. Find what happens what happens when a group of Teenagers find their way to the forest.

Relax

  • Graphics of Grand Hike are meant to be easy on the eye. All of the sound effects and ambience sounds are highest quality. Every object in the world of Grand Hike is hand placed and optimized to ensure the player has a great time.

Length

  • The length of the Hike depends on the player, But the game will approximately last for 2 hours.

Collect

  • Grand Hike hides a lot of secrets. Find a lot of deeply hidden fun secrets & get awarded for them!

data.short_description: Go on a unique and unforgettable Hike and discover the old historical forest and it's secrets. Get ready for an calm and relaxing adventure far away from the civilization. What kinds of encounters will your Hike have?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8
  • Processor: Core i3 / Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 600 series
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct x9
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5 / Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 900 series
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct x9
